summary: A comprehensive pytest suite that validates the behavior of all core model classes in the simulated AWS SWF mock library, including tasks, domains, generic types, history events, timeouts, timers, and workflow executions, by checking state transitions, serialization, timeout handling, and interaction with the moto testing framework.
business_intent: Guarantee that the mock SWF models accurately mimic real SWF semantics so developers can reliably test workflow logic without contacting AWS.
